mapper.select: SELECT sk.ProductId,sk.SeckillId,pp.SpikePrice,pp.ProductPrice,pb.ProductName,pi.ImageSite FROM Seckill sk JOIN ProductBasis pb ON sk.ProductId = pb.ProductId JOIN ProductImage pi ON pb.ProductId = pi.ProductId JOIN ProductPrice pp ON pi.ProductId = pp.ProductId WHERE pi.sign=1 limit #{StartingValue},#{Quantity}

SELECT tl.ProductId,pp.SalesPrice,pp.ProductPrice,pb.ProductName,pi.ImageSite FROM ProductLowPrice tl JOIN ProductBasis pb ON tl.ProductId = pb.ProductId JOIN ProductImage pi ON pb.ProductId = pi.ProductId JOIN ProductPrice pp ON pi.ProductId = pp.ProductId WHERE pi.sign=1 limit #{StartingValue},#{Quantity}

SELECT pb.ProductId, pb.ProductName, pb.hot, pb.Favorite, pp.ProductPrice, pi.ImageSite, pb.productPageviews FROM ProductBasis pb LEFT JOIN ProductPrice pp ON pb.ProductId = pp.ProductId LEFT JOIN ProductImage pi ON pb.ProductId = pi.ProductId WHERE pi.sign = 1 ORDER BY pp.ProductSales DESC limit 0 ,#{quantity};
